TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewImageColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 承载一个 对象集合。

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于以逻辑方式承载显示图像的单元格的 类的专用类型。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that display images. 在与它相交的每个 中具有关联的 。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每个单元格都可以包含一个 或 ，具体取决于 属性的值。Each cell is capable of containing an or an , depending on the value of the property. 显示图标对于容纳具有透明度的图像很有用。Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency. 默认情况下，空单元格显示默认错误图。By default, empty cells display a default error graphic. 若要防止此图形显示为等于 `null` 或 的单元值，请在向控件添加行之前，将 属性返回的单元格样式对象的 属性设置为 `null`。To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or , set the property of the cell style object returned by the property to `null` before adding rows to the control. 但这不会影响新记录的行。This does not affect the row for new records, however. 若要防止在 `true`控件 属性值时在新记录的行中显示错误图形，还必须在控件 事件的处理程序中将单元格的值显式设置为 `null`，或使用返回 的重写 属性将列 属性设置为 `null`派生的类型的实例。To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control event or set the column property to an instance of a -derived type with an overridden property that returns `null`. 此列类型的默认排序模式为 。The default sort mode for this column type is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用图像创建 TicTacToe 游戏。The following code example demonstrates how to use images to create a TicTacToe game. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#0)]

para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally configuring it for use with cell values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通过设置以下属性来初始化列。This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties. |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||一个新的 ，其 属性已初始化为 `valuesAreIcons` 参数值。A new with its property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| ||`valuesAreIcons` 参数的值。The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| | 属性返回的 对象的 属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|| | 属性返回的 对象的 属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|如果 `valuesAreIcons` 为 `true`，则为类型 标准错误图形，如果 `valuesAreIcons` `false`，则键入 。A standard error graphic of type if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| 若要确保正确绘制 单元格值的 alpha 通道，请将此构造函数与 `valuesAreIcons` 参数值 `true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数将此属性初始化为新创建的 。The constructors for the class initialize this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列现有单元的用户界面（UI）。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改仅在重新生成列后才明显（例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用 方法进行）。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是[如何：操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)中的列的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides Property DefaultCellStyle As DataGridViewCellStyle

public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ DefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的默认 具有以下初始属性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 属性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|默认值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| ||| ||如果初始 属性值 `true`，则为类型 标准错误图形;否则为 类型的标准错误图形。A standard error graphic of type if the initial property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type .| 这些值覆盖 控件的 属性中指定的值，但可能被其他单元格样式属性重写。These values override the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 若要防止为 `null` 或 单元值显示标准错误图形，请在向控件添加行之前，将此单元格样式对象的 属性设置为 `null` 或您自己的错误图形。To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or cell values, set the property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control. 但这不会影响新记录的行。This does not affect the row for new records, however. 若要防止在 `true`控件 属性值时在新记录的行中显示错误图形，还必须在控件 事件的处理程序中将单元格的值显式设置为 `null` 或自己的错误图形，或将列 属性设置为 派生的类型的实例，该属性将返回 或您自己的错误图形。`null`To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control event or set the column property to an instance of a -derived type with an overridden property that returns `null` or your own error graphic. 如果 属性返回的对象的 属性的值等于类型 的标准错误图形，则将 属性值更改为 `true` 会自动将 设置为类型 的标准错误图形。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . 如果 的值等于 类型的标准错误图形，则将 属性值更改为 `false` 会自动将 设置为类型 的标准错误图形。If has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置描述列图像的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
The textual description of the column image.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性来描述 或 属性提供的图像。You can use the property to describe the image provided by the or property. 此描述提供了可访问的映像替代方法。This description provides an accessible alternative to the image. 此外，在将单元值复制到剪贴板时，还会使用描述文本。Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来反映图像布局。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to reflect the image layout. 此示例摘自[如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中处理图像列](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

summary.span: 当没有设置单元格的 属性，而且单元格的 属性被设置为 时，获取或设置在此列的单元格中显示的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's property is not set and the cell's property is set to .
The to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果列不是数据绑定，并且单元格的 属性设置为 `true`，则 属性指定在没有值的单元格中显示的图标。The property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's property is set to `true`. 对于其单元格没有关联图像的数据绑定列，将显示标准错误图形。For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed. 使用 属性而不是 属性可以确保正确绘制图标中的 alpha 通道。Using the property rather than the property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly. 如果要显示 而不是 ，请改为设置 属性，并将 属性设置为 `false`。If you want to display an instead of an , set the property instead and set the property to `false`. 您还可以设置单个单元格的 属性，以指示该单元格是否显示 或 属性值。You can also set the property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the or the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Image ^ Image { System::Drawing::Image ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Image ^ value); };
member this.Image : System.Drawing.Image with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 当没有设置单元格的 属性，而且单元格的 属性被设置为 时，获取或设置在此列的单元格中显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's property is not set and the cell's property is set to .
The to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定当列未进行数据绑定并且单元格的 属性设置为 `false`时，在没有值的单元格中显示的图像。The property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's property is set to `false`. 对于其单元格没有关联图像的数据绑定列，将显示标准错误图形。For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed. 如果要显示 而不是 ，请改为设置 属性，并将 属性设置为 `true`。If you want to display an instead of an , set the property instead and set the property to `true`. 这可确保正确绘制 的 alpha 通道。This ensures that the alpha channel of the is painted correctly. 还可以设置单个单元格的 属性，以指示该单元格是否在没有单元格值时显示 或 属性值。You can also set the property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the or the property value when there is no cell value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置默认图像。The following code example demonstrates how to set the default image. 此示例摘自[如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中处理图像列](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout ImageLayout { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此列的单元格中的图像布局。

span.span: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
A that specifies the cell layout.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何拉伸和缩放图像以适合单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to stretch and zoom images to fit cells. 此示例摘自[如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中处理图像列](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确保正确绘制 值的 alpha 通道，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 如果 属性返回的对象的 属性的值等于类型 的标准错误图形，则将 属性值更改为 `true` 会自动将 设置为类型 的标准错误图形。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . 如果 的值等于 类型的标准错误图形，则将 属性值更改为 `false` 会自动将 设置为类型 的标准错误图形。If has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type .
